info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Prowers, eastern Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Towner to 9 miles south of John Martin Reservoir. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Towner around 635 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
